A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is fantastic. It goes to new places brilliantly\, and brings familiarity with finesse. Fantastic performances and excellently directed. This is the most ambitious Star Wars film to date and it pays off in a big way. Not a single shot is boring\, not a single character is archetypal\, not a single action sequence isn't intense and enjoyable\, not a single arc is weak or unbelievable. This is Star Wars at its best and boldest. Amazing. Simply amazing.
